ygData.subject: The Pack's course of action
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmmm. I say we wait but keep track of the Trainers. As soon as this battle is over they will be weak. We strike then. We can also talk with the Alliance

battle is over they will be weak. We strike then. We can also talk with
the Alliance then also."
